reviews.review_msg: Artistic differences, let's say. If I put a lot of work into something and was proud of what I'd achieved artistically, I didn't do any better than if I just submitted crap to get the assignment done. I definitely learned in this course, but I didn't really learn what I wanted to and I left with absolutely no further interest in electronic music.
Teaches like he's teaching high school. Very clear, but timid and not very inspiring... Sweet guy, though...
Great prof; very helpful, interested and interesting, and gives enjoyable assignments.  Always willing to help.
One of the best and most underrated profs out there.  This guy is so humble!
